content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Create cluster-managed policies in Container Security October 9, 2024—You can now interact directly with the Kubernetes API to create and manage Container Security cluster-managed policies and rulesets within your Kubernetes clusters. This integration facilitates seamless deployment of Container Security policies and rulesets with your GitOps workflows. For more information, see Cluster-managed policies. Cloud Security → Container Security → Container Inventory © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Create cluster-managed policies in Container Security
